T02D3249:14a-1: aa pa r'a dzi ta s'a dha nam /
T02D3249:14a-3: gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02D3249:14a-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho ga'i rim pas snying ga'i zla
T02D3249:14a-5: ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge aom dkar po las
T02D3249:14a-6: grub pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan gyis mi thub
T02D3249:14a-7: ma dkar mo aa ta pa tra zhal gsum phyag
T02D3249:14a-8: drug ma ste / zhal re re la spyan gsum gsum ma /
T02D3249:14a-9: dkar ba dang mthing nag dang /
T02D3249:14a-10: skye rengs ni g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal lo //
T02D3249:14a-11: 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang gzhu ni g-yas pa'i phyag gsum gyis bsnams pa'o //
T02D3249:14a-12: rdo rje dkar po dang mda' dang zhags pa bsnams
T02D3249:14a-13: shing sdigs mdzub mdzad pa ni g-yon pa'i phyag go
T02D3249:14a-14: // khros pa'i spyan gyis gzigs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D3249:14a-15: gdon thams cad rlag par mdzad pa /
T02D3249:14a-16: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bza' dang ldan pa /
T02D3249:14a-17: rnam par snang mdzad gtso bor gyur pa bsgoms la phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D3249:14a-18: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcangs pa'i sdigs mdzub
T02D3249:14a-19: snying gar legs par bzhag la lag pa g-yon pas
T02D3249:14a-20: khu tshur bcangs pa gdeng bar bya ba'o //
T02D3249:14a-21: bzlas pa ni aom si t'a ta pa tr'a pa
T02D3249:14a-22: r'a dzi te sarba gra h'a na tr'a sa ya
T02D3249:14a-23: / ha na ha na drum drum h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3249:14a-24: zhes bya ba ni 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma gdugs dkar mo'i sgrub thabs so /
